verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O come, our Great Redeemer. We long to see Your face, To behold the Son, who salvation won When He suffered in our place.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Face to face with Christ my Savior, Face to face—what will it be When with rapture I behold Him there, Jesus Christ, who died for me?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only faintly now we see You, With a darkened glass between. But a blesséd day is coming soon When Your glory will be seen.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What rejoicing in Your presence, When you wipe all tears away. All the crooked ways will be made straight When we see You in that day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
